title: Capturing Clint
description: Clint let Chrissy, the adorable nerd, slip through his fingers while in college.  Ten years later, after a chance encounter, Chrissy will use her sexy confidence to ensure that doesn’t happen again. Clint is more than interested but doesn’t feel worthy, and it’ll be up to Chrissy to show him how good they can be together.  #friendstolovers #secondchancelove
author: Laura M. Baird
